title: Ranked wins at end of the season [@RIOT]
body:
**Please read the entire thread**

Can we keep our ranked wins at end of season?
Or have them added to our normal wins at end of season?

Otherwise I just think people who dont manage to get a banner will have nothing to show for it, and therefor invisible experience
Many people who hit level 30 just start only playing ranked games because thats the next level of play and Im sure there are alot of people with alot of ranked games played this season (Much more than normal wins) and failed to get out of bronze and wont even have anything to show for all the games they played because ranked wins go away at end of season.

**I think we need to make this experience no longer invisible and make a tab for previous season ranked wins on our profiles!**

Or one of the suggestions at the start of the thread if you think they would be better
{{summoner:1}}

I just want to point out that, having a massive amount of wins and still being in bronze isn't an accomplishment.
It shows commitment rather than skill.

You get an Icon that will say "Bronze 2015". Congrats.

Also there you can see your ranked stats. You go to leagues - more stats and you can change what season stats you look at.
